segments.text: Over to the left, I see two children engaged in some serious mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is standing on a wobbly-looking two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach the cookie jar in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance looks incredibly precarious; the stool is actually tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's got his hand right inside the "COOKIE JAR"!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And he's holding a plate with the other hand, ready to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing below, reaching up with an expectant look on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever little operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool looks like it could tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice them before they succeed or fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're completely oblivious to the overflowing sink, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a busy little scene of covert operations.
segments.speaker: PAR
